prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with a sleek blue and black design, featuring striking yellow accents.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a lion cub, with a fluffy mane and bright blue fur.
Design a small, agile Pokemon that combines elements of both feline and electric features.
Show me a Pokemon with a playful personality, characterized by its vibrant colors and dynamic pose.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, showcasing a combination of speed and agility.
Give me a Pokemon with a tail that has a star shape, emphasizing its electric abilities.
Make a Pokemon that embodies both cuteness and strength, with striking blue and yellow tones.
